price: 96. Alobi: Namoni oyo bamona te. Nazuaki mabele ya makolo ya motindami (ya anzelu) na bwakaki yango, wana nde ndenge molimo mwa ngai motindaki ngai.
arabic: قَالَ بَصُرۡتُ بِمَا لَمۡ يَبۡصُرُواْ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضۡتُ قَبۡضَةٗ مِّنۡ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذۡتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتۡ لِي نَفۡسِي

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla baṣur'tu bimā lam yabṣurū bihi faqabaḍtu qabḍatan min athari al-rasūli fanabadhtuhā wakadhālika sawwalat lī nafsī
